Buttons

Use Pdui CSS custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.

Solid buttons
There are default button, primary button, success button, warning button, danger button and white button in pdui
<div class="pd-btn">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success">Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning">Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger">Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white">White</div>
Soft buttons
There are default button, primary button, success button, warning button, danger button and white button in pdui
<div class="pd-btn">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success">Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning">Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger">Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white">White</div>
Outline buttons
There are default button, primary button, success button, warning button, danger button and white button in pdui
<div class="pd-btn">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success">Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning">Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger">Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white">White</div>
Text buttons
There are default button, primary button, success button, warning button, danger button and white button in pdui
<div class="pd-btn">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success">Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning">Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger">Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white">White</div>
Size
Pdui supports a default button size as well as a large and small size.
<div class="pd-btn sm">Small</div> 
<div class="pd-btn">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn lg">Large</div>
Block
block class will make the button fit to its parent width.
<div class="pd-btn block">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary block">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success block">Success</div>
loading
A loading indicator can be added to a button by setting the loading class on the Button.
<div class="pd-btn loading">Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary loading">Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success loading">Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning loading">Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger loading">Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white loading">White</div>
Disabled
To mark a button as disabled, add the disabled class to the Button.
<div class="pd-btn loading" disabled>Default</div> 
<div class="pd-btn primary loading" disabled>Primary</div> 
<div class="pd-btn success loading" disabled>Success</div> 
<div class="pd-btn warning loading" disabled>Warning</div> 
<div class="pd-btn danger loading" disabled>Danger</div> 
<div class="pd-btn white loading" disabled>White</div>
Group
Buttons can be grouped by placing multiple Buttons.
<div class="pd-btn-group">
    <div class="pd-btn loading">Default</div>
    <div class="pd-btn primary loading">Primary</div>
</div>
Icon
Buttons only with icons.
<div class="pd-btn-group">
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="icon-clipboard"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="icon-facebook"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="pd-icon.pd-icon-menu-alt"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn primary icon"><i class="icon-code"></i></div>
</div>
Radio
Buttons circle only with icons.
<div class="pd-btn-group">
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="icon-clipboard"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="icon-facebook"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn icon"><i class="pd-icon.pd-icon-menu-alt"></i></div>
    <div class="pd-btn primary icon"><i class="icon-code"></i></div>
</div>

API

Property Class
Button .pd-btn
Color .primary.success.warning.danger.white
Size .sm.lg
loading .loading
Disabled .disabled
Block .block
Group .pd-btn-group
Icon .icon

Pdui CSS es una libreria Sass/Css minimalista.
